creator: knut@paranor.ch
text:
Runtime.exec() only works under special circumstances on OpenVMS (see release 
notes: http://h18012.www1.hp.com/java/documentation/index.html).  <exec> could 
relax some of these limitations by being OpenVMS aware.

Also return values should be treated differently.  Odd return values signal 
success and even signal error.
